attributes.title: Last of Us in Real Life
attributes.caption: Things get topsy-turvy when our Lab Rats are hung upside down and have to fight off a horde of zombies.
attributes.description: Things get topsy-turvy when our Lab Rats are hung upside down and have to fight off a horde of zombies. Will Michael and Gavin be able to work together and keep the undead at bay? Find out! attributes.title: Last of Us in Real Life Featuring Funhaus
attributes.caption: ​Can James and Adam fight off waves of zombies while hung upside down or will they become hanging meat piñatas?
attributes.description: Can James and Adam fight off waves of zombies while hung upside down or will they become hanging meat pi_Ï„Õ_µ„÷_Ï„_‰Û¡___Õ_µ„__Ï„Õ_µ__Ï___µå±atas? Find out in this very special First Member's episode of Immersion!
attributes.display_title: Last of Us in Real Life Featuring Funhaus

attributes.title: Mass Effect in Real Life
attributes.caption: In this episode, we test whether or not biotic abilities like "Charge" are practical in a real life combat simulation. Will the Lab Rats succeed or will they be Charging towards their doom? Find out!
attributes.description: In this episode, we test whether or not biotic abilities like "Charge" are practical in a real life combat simulation. Will the Lab Rats succeed or will they be Charging towards their doom? Find out! Thanks to EA for sponsoring this special episode of Immersion

attributes.title: Fortnite in Real Life
attributes.caption: Bruce and Lawrence find out if the fortress they designed in a video game can protect them from wave after wave of enemies in real life. Thanks to Epic for sponsoring - check out the game at www.fortnite.com
attributes.description: Bruce and Lawrence find out if the fortress they designed in a video game can protect them from wave after wave of enemies in real life. Thanks to Epic for sponsoring

attributes.title: Fortnite in Real Life Featuring Achievement Hunter
attributes.caption: Ryan and Jeremy must defend their fortress from waves of enemies while scavenging for ammunition in the battlefield. Will they survive? Can they beat Funhaus? Find out!
attributes.description: Ryan and Jeremy must defend their fortress from waves of enemies while scavenging for ammunition in the battlefield. Will they survive? Can they beat Funhaus? Find out!
attributes.display_title: Fortnite in Real Life Featuring Achievement Hunter
